targets.query:
from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Name" or r["_field"] == "Place" or r["_field"] == "Os")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["agent_host"], mode:"by")
  |> last(column: "_time")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PSU_Status")
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> count()

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PSU_Status")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Index: r.index }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "Index", "source"])

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FAN_Status")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Index: r.index }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "Index", "source"])

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FAN_Status")
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> count()

typ = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorType")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  

value = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorValue")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  

name = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorName")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] == "172.19.0.47")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  

precision = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorPrecision")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  

scale = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorScale")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] == "172.19.0.47")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  

status = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorStatus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  

join1 = join(
  tables: {typ: typ, value: value},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)

join2 = join(
  tables: {join1: join1, name: name},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)

join3 = join(
  tables: {join2: join2, precision: precision},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)

join4 = join(
  tables: {join3: join3, scale: scale},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)

finalJoin = join(
  tables: {join4: join4, status: status},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      index: r.index,
      SensorName: r["_value_join2"],
      SensorStatus: r["_value_status"],
      SensorPrecision: r["_value_precision"],
      SensorScale: r["_value_join4"],
      SensorType: r["_value_typ"],
      OriginalValue: r["_value_value"],
      TransformedValue: if r["_value_join4"] == 8 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 9 then float(v: r["_value_value"])
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 7 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 6 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 5 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 4 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 3 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 2 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 1 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 10 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 11 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 12 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 13 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 14 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 15 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 16 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 17 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000000000000000.0
                        else float(v: r["_value_value"])
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SensorType"] == 8)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.TransformedValue }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "SensorName", "_value"])  
  |> group(columns: ["SensorName"], mode:"by")
  |> yield(name: "final_results")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CPU1m")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "CPU1m")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "MemUsed" or r["_field"] == "MemFree")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (float(v: r.MemUsed) * 100.0) / (float(v: r.MemFree) + float(v: r.MemUsed)) }))
  |> last(column: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "MemUsed")

typ = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorType")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  
  |> last(column: "_time")

value = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorValue")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  
  |> last(column: "_time")

name = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorName")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] == "172.19.0.47")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  
  |> last(column: "_time")

precision = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorPrecision")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  
  |> last(column: "_time")

scale = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorScale")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] == "172.19.0.47")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  
  |> last(column: "_time")

status = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorStatus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  
  |> last(column: "_time")

join1 = join(
  tables: {typ: typ, value: value},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)

join2 = join(
  tables: {join1: join1, name: name},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)

join3 = join(
  tables: {join2: join2, precision: precision},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)

join4 = join(
  tables: {join3: join3, scale: scale},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)

finalJoin = join(
  tables: {join4: join4, status: status},
  on: ["_time", "index"]
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      index: r.index,
      SensorName: r["_value_join2"],
      SensorStatus: r["_value_status"],
      SensorPrecision: r["_value_precision"],
      SensorScale: r["_value_join4"],
      SensorType: r["_value_typ"],
      OriginalValue: r["_value_value"],
      TransformedValue: if r["_value_join4"] == 8 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 9 then float(v: r["_value_value"])
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 7 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 6 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 5 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 4 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 3 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 2 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 1 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) / 1000000000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 10 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 11 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 12 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 13 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 14 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 15 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 16 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000000000000.0
                        else if r["_value_join4"] == 17 then float(v: r["_value_value"]) * 1000000000000000000000000.0
                        else float(v: r["_value_value"])
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SensorType"] == ${SensorTypes})
  |> yield(name: "final_results")

import "strings"

// Lade VLAN-Daten mit Namen und behalte die Index-Spalte
vlans = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VLAN")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {index: "vmVlan"}) // Umbenennen der Spalte index in vmVlan
  |> keep(columns: ["vmVlan", "vlanName", "vlanDot10Said", "vlanMtu", "vlanState", "vlanType"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with vmVlan: strings.replaceAll(v: string(v: r.vmVlan), t: "'", u: "")
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with vmVlan: strings.replaceAll(v: r.vmVlan, t: ",", u: "")
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with vmVlan: if strings.hasPrefix(v: r.vmVlan, prefix: "1.") then strings.trimPrefix(v: r.vmVlan, prefix: "1.") else r.vmVlan
    }))
  |> last(column: "vlanName")

vlan_membership = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VlanMembership")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {index: "ifIndex"}) // Umbenennen der Spalte index in ifIndex
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ifIndex: string(v: r.ifIndex) })) // Konvertiere ifIndex zu String
  |> last(column: "vmVlan")

interfaces = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifDescr" or r["_field"] == "ifIndex")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ifIndex: string(v: r.ifIndex) })) // Konvertiere ifIndex zu String
  |> last(column: "ifName")  


vlan_interfaces = join(
  tables: {vlan_membership: vlan_membership, interfaces: interfaces},
  on: ["ifIndex"]
)

result = join(
  tables: {vlans: vlans, vlan_interfaces: vlan_interfaces},
  on: ["vmVlan"]
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with VlanID: r.vmVlan }))

result

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "VPC")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "source", "index", "vpcSystemOperMacAddress", "vpcLocalRoleAdminPriority", "vpcLocalRoleOperPriority", "vpcPeerKeepAliveTime", "vpcRoleStatus", "vpcPeerKeepAliveStatus" "vpcSystemAdminMacAddress", "vpcSystemAdminPriority", "vpcSystemOperMacAddress", "vpcSystemOperPriority", "vpcLocalOperMacAddress"])
  |> group(columns: ["source", "index"], mode:"by")
  |> last(column: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Name: r.source }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Index: r.index }))

status = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifOperStatus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ifName"] =~ /^${Interface:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "_value_status"})
  |> last(column: "_value_status")


admin = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifAdminStatus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ifName"] =~ /^${Interface:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "_value_admin"})
  |> last(column: "_value_admin")

speed = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifHighSpeed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ifName"] =~ /^${Interface:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "_value_speed"})
  |> last(column: "_value_speed")

status_admin = join(
  tables: {status: status, admin: admin},
  on: ["_time", "ifName"]
)

final_join = join(
  tables: {status_admin: status_admin, speed: speed},
  on: ["_time", "ifName"]
)

final_join
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Port: r.ifName }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with OperStatusCause: r.ifOperStatusCause_status }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value_status", "_value_admin", "_value_speed", "ifName", "Port", "agent_host", "OperStatusCause" ])
  |> last(column: "_value_admin")

import "strings"

// Query for interface data
interface = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IF" and r["_field"] == "ifDescr" and r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["index", "_value", "_time"])
  |> last(column: "index")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with PortIndex: r.index }))

// Query for stb data
stb = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "STP" and r["source"] == "${Hostname}" and r["_field"] == "dot1dBasePortIfIndex")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "index", "_time"])
  |> last(column: "index")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      PortIndex: strings.replaceAll(v: string(v: r._value), t: "'", u: ""),
      index_stb: r.index
  }))

// Updated query for STP_PortState, including STP_PortDesignatedRoot and STP_PortPathCost
stp_port_state = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "STP" and r["source"] == "${Hostname}" and (r["_field"] == "STP_PortState" or r["_field"] == "STP_PortDesignatedRoot" or r["_field"] == "STP_PortPathCost"))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      index_stb: r.index, // Assuming 'index' is part of the pivot
      PortState: r.STP_PortState,
      PortDesignatedRoot: r.STP_PortDesignatedRoot,
      PortPathCost: r.STP_PortPathCost
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["index_stb", "PortState", "PortDesignatedRoot", "PortPathCost"])

// First join between stb and interface on PortIndex
joined_results = join(
  tables: {stb: stb, iface: interface},
  on: ["PortIndex"]
)

// Second join including the stp_port_state
final_join = join(
  tables: {status_admin: joined_results, stp_state: stp_port_state},
  on: ["index_stb"]
)
  |> yield(name: "finalResults")

import "strings"

// Retrieve interface descriptions
interfaces = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)  // Definieren des Zeitbereichs
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "IF")  // Filtern nach Messung "IF"
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ifDescr" or r._field == "ifName" or r._field == "ifIndex")  // Filtern nach relevanten Feldern
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")  // Pivotieren der Daten, um Felder als Spalten zu haben
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      ifIndex_str: string(v: r.ifIndex)  // Umwandeln des ifIndex-Felds in eine Zeichenfolge
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      PortIndex: strings.replaceAll(v: r.ifIndex_str, t: "", u: "")  // Ersetzen von nicht-numerischen Zeichen und Umbenennen in PortIndex
  }))
  |> drop(columns: ["ifIndex", "ifIndex_str"])  // Entfernen der alten Felder ifIndex und ifIndex_str
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "PortIndex", "ifDescr", "ifName"])  // Beibehalten der gewnschten Spalten

// Retrieve LACP data
lacp_data = from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)  // Definieren des Zeitbereichs
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "LACP")  // Filtern nach Messung "LACP"
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "lacpPortNumber" or r._field == "lacpPortState" or r._field == "lacpPortPartnerAdminState" or r._field == "lacpPortPartnerSystemID" or r._field == "lacpPortPartnerPortNumber" or r._field == "lacpPortPartnerKey")  // Filtern nach relevanten Feldern
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")  // Pivotieren der Daten, um Felder als Spalten zu haben
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with PortIndex: r.index }))  // Umbenennen des Index-Felds in PortIndex
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "lacpPortNumber", "lacpPortState", "lacpPortPartnerAdminState", "lacpPortPartnerSystemID", "lacpPortPartnerPortNumber", "lacpPortPartnerKey", "PortIndex"])  // Beibehalten der gewnschten Spalten

// Join LACP data with interface descriptions
lacp_with_interfaces = join(
  tables: {interfaces: interfaces, lacp_data: lacp_data},  // Verbinden der beiden Datenstrme
  on: ["_time", "PortIndex"]  // Verbinden auf Basis der Zeit und PortIndex
)

// Ausgabe der kombinierten Daten
lacp_with_interfaces
  |> last(column: "_time")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IF")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifInDiscards")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ifName"] =~ /^${Interface:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["ifName", "_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IF")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifInErrors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ifName"] =~ /^${Interface:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["ifName", "_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IF")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifInUnknownProtos")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ifName"] =~ /^${Interface:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["ifName", "_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifHCOutOctets")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["ifName", "_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IF")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifOutDiscards")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ifName"] =~ /^${Interface:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["ifName", "_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IF")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifOutErrors")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Name")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
list.label: Hostname
list.name: Hostname
list.query:
from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Name")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifAdminStatus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["ifName"])
list.label: Interface
list.name: Interface
list.query:
from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ifAdminStatus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["ifName"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorType")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  
  |> last(column: "_time")
list.label: Sensor Types Nr
list.name: SensorTypes
list.query:
from(bucket: "cisconx9000")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SensorType")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "${Hostname}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "index"])  
  |> last(column: "_time")
